rationale: The phrase 'isn't concerned' is a reassuring cue (Q5), not a Q1 cue.
statement_text: Genetic traces of bird flu virus have been identified in 1 out of 5 samples of retail milk, but the Food & Drug Administration (FDA) isn't concerned when it comes to pasteurized products.
